Arguments.Name: CodigoFilial
Arguments.Tooltip: Branch code to be selected on OracleRP.

Arguments.Name: Time_out
Arguments.Tooltip: Timeout in milliseconds the the activity waits to load the screens. The default value is 30000 ms.

Arguments.Name: DelayBefore
Arguments.Tooltip:
Delay in milliseconds before to execute an action on screen.
*The default value is 1000 ms.

Arguments.Name: CodigoTomador
Arguments.Tooltip: Company to be selected on OracleRP.

Arguments.Name: Erro
Arguments.Tooltip: If there was any exception this flag is set.
